title: I didn't meant to leave the game.
body: Today 1 in the morning, I was playing league of legends but my WiFi got broken and I got 5 times penalty... Seriously I didn't meant to leave and I wanted to play. I knew I would get penalty if I leave the game.  Please get rid of penalty please.  Think about it.... why would I leave the Ranked Game.???? League point is important to me and I don't want to lose the league point. Please again, get rid of penalty please.

replies.body: You're not suppose to play when you already noticed the lack of stability in your Internet, so technically, that's still your fault.

You are responsible for making sure your network is stable. You may not have meant to leave but you still inconvenced your team.

Leaverbuster punishments are not overturned.
Another way to paraphrase what this guys saying is, league doesn't care, if you leave you get in trouble, they won't remove your punishment, so suck it up.
